title: Purchase Issues
body:
I bought the Snow Day Bard skin on 8/16/2016 after i bought the champion with Ip. For Two weeks it showed the purchase in my history and removed 1350  Rp from my account. The skin was for whatever reason unavailable for me to use for the last two weeks. Today I added 10$ to my account to use the remaining 1300+ rp i had leftover to buy a bundle. I still haven't received Snow Day Bard or a refund of my Rp. Also the purchase of the bard skin no longer is in my account purchases. I'm just a guy who wants either his money back or his skin. Please help me, it would be much appreciated. Thank you for your time.            

Your Friendly Jinx main, J {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and was unable to find a record of your snow day bard purchase. Since we'll need to dive deeper and do some thorough investigating, I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our account specialists will be able to assist further with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
